April 19, 1955
Mr. M. 3, iJovik
300 W. 23rd Street
Hew York 11, Ifew York
Dear Morriet
Onoo again a reminder of the need for a report due at FAS May 1 on
your service.
Could your report include not only sujsaary to date but also an area-
ty-area ooesnant as far as you know, of the status in each, and perhaps
with regard and relation to the Center (and Yourd)?
\te also need a fiscal report, but I'll see if Bob Coleman can't send
that to as direct upon receipt of carbon of this.
It was nice to see you. Sony I got so "snowed" I missed your party.
For a while, I was late every place because of Interceptions, by
members with questions, each time I started any place.
Most sincerely,
Harry J. Skarola
Executive Director
HJStJy

cot Mr. Frank E* Sohooley
